text: 35|28|manitarkalilum, uyirullavarrilum (atu, matu, ottakam mutaliya) kalnataikalilum ivvare pala nirankal irukkinrana. Niccayamaka allahvutaiya atiyarkalil avanukkup payappatupavarkalellam (arivutaiya) kalvimankaltan. Niccayamaka allah (anaivaraiyum) mikaittavanum mikka mannipputaiyavanum avan
